content: > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > group you are welcome to share your > project photos links to your > favourite patterns and connect with > others in an encouraging and positive > environment click here to join 1 if you re in need of some quick and practical projects these crochet washcloth patterns are definitely for you each one is designed with a simple stitch throughout focusing on a quick relaxing and eye catching finished piece make one washcloth or make all five using your favourite worsted weight cotton yarn each washcloth has its own section that includes materials needed and other important details please follow the link to learn more about each individual washcloth design **the washcloths included are ** - suzette stitch washcloth - lemon peel stitch washcloth - even moss stitch washcloth - extended single_crochet washcloth - half_double_crochet washcloth special stitch tutorials are included with each design happy crocheting 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
